note.p: Birth: Browsholme Hall, Yorkshire, England (17 or 27 September 1779)
Death: The Starr Inn, Deansgate, Manchester, Lancashire (02 March 1858)
Burial: Family chapel in Waddington Church, Yorkshire

Career: Spent large amounts of money laying out the grounds of Browsholme Hall (1797-1810); collected pictures and antiquities; Trumpeter to the Queen, a sinecure office; sold Browsholme estate (1824)
Notes: Boase gives birth date as 17 September 1779.
